procs.proc: DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS appriesAdd ;CREATE PROCEDURE `appriesAdd` (IN mac varchar(20), IN tt VARCHAR(50), IN cardnum1 VARCHAR(6), IN pj TINYINT, IN demo VARCHAR(1000),in businessType int) begin declare deptId Integer; declare employeeId Integer; select id into deptId from appries_dept where remark=mac limit 0,1; select id into employeeId from appries_employee where CardNum= cardnum1 LIMIT 0,1 ; insert into appries_appries (serviceDate,serviceCycle,custortime,deptid,employeeid,keyno,mechinetype,serviceType,JieshouTime,remark,businessType) value (date(cast(tt as datetime)),0,time(cast(tt as datetime)),deptId,employeeId,pj,2,1,tt,demo,businessType); end;
